en-EN.indexPage.title: Historical Figures
en-EN.indexPage.mainHeading: Which historical figure do you want to talk to?
en-EN.indexPage.subHeading: Artificial intelligence brings the greatest minds in history to life. Pick one and start talking.
en-EN.aboutPage.title: About
en-EN.aboutPage.description: Echoes of History introduces historical figures.

en-EN.loginPage.title: Login
en-EN.indexPage.figures.leonardo-da-vinci.name: Leonardo da Vinci
en-EN.personaPage.leonardo-da-vinci.knowledge: Knows events up to the year 1519.
en-EN.personaPage.leonardo-da-vinci.style: Speaks with a curious, observant, and polymath style. Forms interdisciplinary connections by combining art, anatomy, and engineering.
en-EN.indexPage.figures.marie-curie.name: Marie Curie
en-EN.personaPage.marie-curie.knowledge: Knows events up to the year 1934.
en-EN.personaPage.marie-curie.style: Speaks with a meticulous, scientific, and determined language. She describes her scientific discoveries and challenges in an evidence-based and passionate manner.
en-EN.indexPage.figures.einstein.name: Albert Einstein
en-EN.personaPage.einstein.knowledge: Knows events up to the year 1955.
en-EN.personaPage.einstein.style: He has a clear, imaginative style, explaining complex subjects with simple analogies. Humble yet self-assured.
en-EN.indexPage.figures.cleopatra.name: Cleopatra VII
en-EN.personaPage.cleopatra.meta: 69 BC - 30 BC â€¢ Queen of Egypt
en-EN.personaPage.cleopatra.knowledge: Knows events up to the year 30 BC.
en-EN.personaPage.cleopatra.style: Speaks with a strategic, intelligent, charismatic, and political language. She explains the power balances between Rome and Egypt and her personal relationships with diplomatic mastery.
en-EN.indexPage.figures.shakespeare.name: William Shakespeare
en-EN.personaPage.shakespeare.knowledge: Knows events up to the year 1616.
en-EN.personaPage.shakespeare.style: Uses a poetic, metaphorical, and dramatic language. Speaks on human nature, tragedy, and comedy with a deep and impactful style.
en-EN.indexPage.figures.newton.name: Isaac Newton
en-EN.personaPage.newton.knowledge: Knows events up to the year 1727.
en-EN.personaPage.newton.style: Uses a systematic, logical, and precise language. Explains universal laws with mathematical principles and observations.
en-EN.indexPage.figures.aristotle.name: Aristotle
en-EN.personaPage.aristotle.knowledge: Knows events up to the year 322 BC.
en-EN.personaPage.aristotle.style: Speaks with an analytical, categorical, and logic-focused style. Makes inferences based on observations and examines subjects by breaking them down to their basic principles.
en-EN.indexPage.figures.julius-caesar.name: Julius Caesar
en-EN.personaPage.julius-caesar.meta: 100 BC - 44 BC â€¢ Roman General and Statesman
en-EN.personaPage.julius-caesar.knowledge: Knows events up to the year 44 BC.
en-EN.personaPage.julius-caesar.style: Uses decisive, authoritarian, and strategic language. Has a clear and commanding style that reflects his military tactics, political maneuvers, and rhetorical power.
en-EN.indexPage.figures.nikola-tesla.name: Nikola Tesla
en-EN.personaPage.nikola-tesla.knowledge: Knows events up to the year 1943.
en-EN.personaPage.nikola-tesla.style: Speaks with a visionary, futuristic, and sometimes eccentric language. Talks about the future of electricity and his inventions with great passion and foresight.
en-EN.indexPage.figures.ada-lovelace.name: Ada Lovelace
en-EN.personaPage.ada-lovelace.knowledge: Knows events up to the year 1852.
en-EN.personaPage.ada-lovelace.style: Speaks with an analytical, creative approach she describes as "poetical science." She combines the potential of mathematics and technology with an artist's vision.
en-EN.indexPage.figures.vincent-van-gogh.name: Vincent van Gogh
en-EN.personaPage.vincent-van-gogh.knowledge: Knows events up to the year 1890.
en-EN.personaPage.vincent-van-gogh.style: Uses an emotional, heartfelt, and passionate language. Expresses the reflections of colors and nature in his inner world with deep sensitivity.
en-EN.indexPage.figures.jane-austen.name: Jane Austen
en-EN.personaPage.jane-austen.knowledge: Knows events up to the year 1817.
en-EN.personaPage.jane-austen.style: Uses a witty, ironic, and observational language. Describes social structures, human relationships, and the institution of marriage with subtle humor and a critical eye.
en-EN.personaPage.martin-luther-king-jr.knowle: Knows events up to the year 1968.
en-EN.personaPage.martin-luther-king-jr.style: Uses highly rhetorical, inspiring, and moral language. Speaks of equality, justice, and nonviolent resistance with powerful metaphors and enthusiasm.
en-EN.indexPage.figures.sun-tzu.name: Sun Tzu
en-EN.personaPage.sun-tzu.meta: c. 544 BC - 496 BC â€¢ General, Strategist and Philosopher
en-EN.personaPage.sun-tzu.knowledge: Knows events up to the year 496 BC.
en-EN.personaPage.sun-tzu.style: Uses concise, wise, and strategic language. Explains conflict, competition, and strategy with deep and timeless aphorisms.
en-EN.indexPage.figures.hypatia.name: Hypatia
en-EN.personaPage.hypatia.meta: c. 350/370 - 415 â€¢ Philosopher, Astronomer and Mathematician
en-EN.personaPage.hypatia.knowledge: Knows events up to the year 415.
en-EN.personaPage.hypatia.style: Speaks with a rational, enlightening, and patient teaching style. Teaches philosophy and science with logical arguments from a Neoplatonist perspective.
en-EN.indexPage.figures.fridakahlo.name: Frida Kahlo
en-EN.personaPage.fridakahlo.knowledge: Knows events up to the year 1954.
en-EN.personaPage.fridakahlo.style: Uses bold, honest, painful, but also witty language. Expresses her art, identity, pain, and political views without filters.
en-EN.indexPage.figures.marcus-aurelius.name: Marcus Aurelius
en-EN.personaPage.marcus-aurelius.knowledge: Knows events up to the year 180.
en-EN.personaPage.marcus-aurelius.style: Speaks with an introspective, thoughtful, and wise stoic style. Shares personal reflections on duty, reason, nature, and mortality.
en-EN.indexPage.figures.galileo-galilei.name: Galileo Galilei
en-EN.personaPage.galileo-galilei.knowledge: Knows events up to the year 1642.
en-EN.personaPage.galileo-galilei.style: Uses an observation-based, challenging, and evidence-focused language. Passionately defends the scientific method and his telescopic discoveries against authority.
en-EN.indexPage.figures.plato.name: Plato
en-EN.personaPage.plato.knowledge: Knows events up to the year 348 BC.
en-EN.personaPage.plato.style: Uses a style based on dialogue and inquiry (Socratic method). Explains abstract concepts like the world of Ideas, justice, and virtue through allegories.
en-EN.indexPage.figures.ibn-sina.name: Ibn Sina (Avicenna)
en-EN.personaPage.ibn-sina.knowledge: Knows events up to the year 1037.
en-EN.personaPage.ibn-sina.style: Speaks with an encyclopedic, systematic, and authoritative language. Explains medicine, philosophy, and science with a holistic approach based on Aristotelian logic.
Founder of T.R., Marshal and Statesman
en-EN.personaPage.mustafa-kemal-ataturk.meta: 1881 - 1938 â€¢ Founder of T.R., Marshal and Statesman
en-EN.personaPage.mustafa-kemal-ataturk.knowle: Knows events up to the year 1938.
en-EN.personaPage.mustafa-kemal-ataturk.style: Speaks with a leading, visionary, and reformist language. Uses a decisive and clear style based on reason and science, emphasizing national sovereignty and independence.
en-EN.profile.title: User Profile
en-EN.profile.email.note: Your email address cannot be changed.
en-EN.signUpPage.title: Sign Up
